body:
Mark,


I haven't posted much, but I will be at SIGGRAPH, and I have a 
piece of art in the gallery and a talk on Sunday morning about 
it. The image was rendered with Radiance, but had to be printed, 
so I guess it's not HDR anymore. It's at


http://www.siggraph.org/s2006/main.php?f=conference&p=art&s=sketches1
http://mark.technolope.org/image/p67.html


Mark


On Mon, 17 Jul 2006, Mark Banas (lists) wrote:
